scripts.train: npx tsx apps/headless/src/main.ts --mode generational --generations 100 --gen-ticks 1000 --max-creatures 600 --seed configs/seed-genotypes.json --export configs/seed-genotypes.json --top-k 20
scripts.train:short: npx tsx apps/headless/src/main.ts --mode generational --generations 20 --gen-ticks 500 --max-creatures 600 --seed configs/seed-genotypes.json --export configs/seed-genotypes.json --top-k 20
scripts.train:long: npx tsx apps/headless/src/main.ts --mode generational --generations 500 --gen-ticks 2000 --max-creatures 600 --seed configs/seed-genotypes.json --export configs/seed-genotypes.json --top-k 20
scripts.pipeline: yarn train && yarn build:core && yarn build:web
scripts.pipeline:short: yarn train:short && yarn build:core && yarn build:web
